page.title: 16Life in Burton
page.content: We asked the population of our village how long they had lived here. One family had been in Burton for only 3 months but 21 families have lived here for over 50 years,one family for 60 years and the longest anyone had lived in Burton was 77 years.Some people were asked why they liked living in Burton.A large majority of the people remarked that Burton was quiet and peaceful.Other reasons were its friendliness,its atmosphere and the rural surroundings.There were 2 or 3 people who said they found it unfriendly.Some people found the heavy traffic that came through Burton a disadvantage and many people said that the bus service was infrequent and expensive.One or two people said that they did not like the low flying aircraft that come over,and some remarked there weren't enough shops.
